title: Lusts of the Libertines
description: First published as part of The 120 days of Sodom Donatien Alphonse Fran√ßois, Marquis de Sade was a French aristocrat, revolutionary politician, philosopher, and writer famous for his libertine sexuality and lifestyle. His works include novels, short stories, plays, dialogues, and political tracts; in his lifetime some were published under his own name, while others appeared anonymously and Sade denied being their author.
author: Marquis de Sade
